message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a fair price considering its unique features and the value it will bring to your life.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the value of this product, $900000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it. Let me know if you're open to that.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $750000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to consider it. After careful thought, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $850000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and uniqueness. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
